```{r}
#| label: general-chunk

chunk_sas <- function(fn) {

  text <- read_lines(fn)
  mark <- "\\* Comments on the code: "

  text |>
    str_remove("^ *$") |>
    str_subset("End of part", negate=TRUE) |>
    paste0(collapse="\n") |>
    str_split("\n\n\n") |>
    unlist() -> chunk

  text |>
    str_subset(mark) |>
    str_replace(mark, "## ") -> titles

  n <- length(titles)

  sas <- paste0(
    titles,
    "\n\n```{}\n",
    chunk[2*(1:n)-1],
    "\n```\n\n::: notes\n",
    chunk[2*(1:n)],
    "\n:::\n\n\n")
  
  return(sas)
}
```
